dialogueLines.line: Are you here to do the spooky dance with us?
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: Do you want to do the spooky dance with us?
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: I have no idea what that means.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: We'll show you how to do the spooky dance!
dialogueLines.speaker: pump
